prompt: turtle crawling with slow notes
target_text:
canvas 800 600
background #001122
tempo 60
sprite turtle crawling x=80 y=520 scale=1
animate sprite turtle 80 520 1 -> 720 520 1 duration 8000
sequence { C3 E3 G3 }

sequence { C4 D4 G3 }

prompt: two turtles racing with upbeat tempo
target_text:
canvas 800 600
background #102030
tempo 130
sprite turtle crawling x=60 y=500 scale=1
sprite turtle crawling x=60 y=540 scale=1
animate sprite turtle 60 500 1 -> 720 500 1 duration 6000 ease in-out
animate sprite turtle 60 540 1 -> 720 540 1 duration 6000 ease in-out
sequence { C4 E4 G4 C5 }

prompt: a bouncing ball with gravity
target_text:
canvas 800 600
background #0A0A0A
asset image ball "assets/ball.png"
spriteimg ball1 from image ball at 200 100 scale 1
physics on
gravity 0 400
damping 0.99
bounds canvas
setvel ball1 120 0
impulse ball1 0 -250

prompt: turtle crawling along a smooth path
target_text:
canvas 800 600
background #001122
sprite turtle crawling x=120 y=520 scale=1
path turtle (120,520) -> (700,520) duration 8000 ease in-out
tempo 80
sequence { C4 D4 E4 }

prompt: place a palm tree and a turtle walking past it
target_text:
canvas 800 600
background #072038
asset image palm "assets/palm.png"
spriteimg palmA from image palm at 620 420 scale 1
sprite turtle crawling x=100 y=520 scale=1
animate sprite turtle 100 520 1 -> 700 520 1 duration 8000 ease in-out
tempo 80
sequence { C4 D4 E4 }
notes: Asset makes scene richer; fallback ok if missing
